channel.title: galaxium on Paul Burton's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in galaxium on Paul Burton's Blog

item.title: Speed, Speed, Glorious Speed
item.description: The above is a screenshot of Galaxium’s file transfer window, whilst sending a file to a WLM client. The speed gets cut off in the column, but that reads ‘424.18 KB/s’. There are a lot of rough edges right now, but fast file transfers are coming :)
